snippet: Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl has asked a military appellate court to disqualify the general in charge of the desertion case against him.
abstract: Sgt Bowe Bergdahl, facing desertion charges related to his 2009 capture by Taliban in Afghanistan, is requesting that Gen Mark A Milley be removed from overseeing his case because Milley's nomination to be Army's chief of staff presents conflict of interest.
lead_paragraph: Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl has asked a military appellate court to disqualify the general in charge of the desertion case against him.

headline.main: Bergdahl Seeks Removal of General in Desertion Case
headline.print_headline: Bergdahl Seeks Removal of General in Desertion Case
